class.name: CentroidCluster

javadoc.text:
A Cluster used by centroid-based clustering algorithms. *

* Defines additionally a cluster center which may not necessarily be a member * of the original data set.
javadoc.param: <T> * the type of points that can be clustered

javadoc.text: Build a cluster centered at a specified point.
javadoc.param: center the point which is to be the center of this cluster

javadoc.text: Get the point chosen to be the center of this cluster.
